nodes.text: Lespectus was a planet located in the Core Worlds region. The historian Eloc Throno included a map with the location of Lespectus in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a book that detailed the Outer Rim planet of Batuu. Lespectus was the homeworld of the Moldwarp Edmo Ectacle.
Lespectus was first mentioned in Star Wars: Datapad, the mobile app companion to the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge theme park land.
